update cms_admin_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

`status` = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},

update cms_admin_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from cms_admin_user u
and u.admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and u.nickname like concat('%',#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and exists (select 1 from cms_admin_user_role ur where ur.admin_id = u.admin_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and u.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
